summary: An ivory / off-white recolor of the Dragonbone bow with reddish accents. Requires Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
Update: get [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25119]the full Dragonbone Ivory weapon set here[/url]!

I didn\'t like the orange-ish colors of the Dragonbone Bow\'s quiver, and I wanted the weapon to match with my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24786]Dragonscale Ivory Armor[/url]. This retexture makes the bones look more pale and gives a copper hue to the bow and quiver.

The Dragonbone Bow is a weapon from the Dawnguard DLC, so the texture won\'t have much of an effect without it!

This is a retexture and not compatible with other mods that replace the Dragonbone Bow texture.

The screenshots feature my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24786]Dragonscale Ivory Armor[/url] retexture and the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5803]Crown Helmets[/url] mod.
author: Damanique
